subject: Re: [junit] Running Junit tests with several JREs within another test
msgSnippet: Elliotte, Was this note in response to the original post, or James s latest comment?  Thanks, David Saff
messageBody:
Elliotte,

Was this note in response to the original post, or James's latest
comment? Thanks,

David Saff

Elliotte Harold wrote:

>
> Sounds like the cart's driving your horse to me. Plus you aren't
> actually testing the real code. There could still be bugs hiding in the
> real code you don't know about. :-(
>
>
